entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 09:41 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
